title: PBE Downloading SLOW AF, in 2 hours I got to 14%... I live in EUNE
body:
Do I need to enable peer to peer tranafer to increase download speed? 

LOL usually has 20-30MS

replies.body: Typically p2p transfers _will _ make your download go faster. You aren't required to use it for patching, but being able to grab data from others help to speed up the process. You can also look over the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if any of those can help boost that PBE download.
